txt.en: 'It seems today that the sapling has perked up, as if the world is brighter. I think that this is a good thing, friend. But, I wonder too, what could we do to make this an even brighter time for the sapling? Perhaps a friend in Hoarhallow might offer insight.'
Marigold told you to dance with plants and they will dance with you. Return to Gl√¢n Vraig and dance with your sapling.

'A bright flower made brighter?'

She thinks.

'I dance, [placeholder]. I dance among the flowers and they dance with me. It is a simple thing, I think but they feel brighter and happier when I dance among them. Perhaps you should do the same.'
Faranil believes that your sapling is especially happy today. She asked that you visit Marigold Winterdown at Horahallow for more insight.
Marigold Wintersdown told you she dances with her plants
Journey to Hoarhallow and ask Marigold Winterdown if she knows of a way to brighten a flower or plant even further.
Make your way to Hoarhallow and speak with Marigold Winterdown
